analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: The GMS score of 40 signals a transition into a Defensive regime. Momentum pushed the score to 40 as the VIX (Fear Index) spiked above 20 and the DXY (Dollar Strength) rose, draining global liquidity. While equities and commodities face a sharp sell-off, the stable NFCI (Credit Stress) suggests this is a liquidity flush rather than a systemic collapse. AI-driven disruption in office real estate adds a layer of risk. Caution is required; maintain high cash levels until volatility stabilizes and breadth improves.

reports.EN: The GMS score of 40 signals a transition into a Defensive regime. Momentum pushed the score to 40 as the VIX (Fear Index) spiked above 20 and the DXY (Dollar Strength) rose, draining global liquidity. While equities and commodities face a sharp sell-off, the stable NFCI (Credit Stress) suggests this is a liquidity flush rather than a systemic collapse. AI-driven disruption in office real estate adds a layer of risk. Caution is required; maintain high cash levels until volatility stabilizes and breadth improves.
reports.ES: El puntaje GMS de 40 seÃ±ala una transiciÃ³n hacia un rÃ©gimen Defensivo. El impulso empujÃ³ el puntaje a 40 mientras el VIX (Ã­ndice de miedo) superÃ³ los 20 y el DXY (fortaleza del dÃ³lar) subiÃ³, drenando la liquidez global. Aunque las acciones y materias primas caen, el NFCI (estrÃ©s crediticio) estable sugiere un agotamiento de liquidez mÃ¡s que un colapso sistÃ©mico. La disrupciÃ³n de la IA en el sector inmobiliario es una advertencia clave de riesgo sectorial. Se recomienda cautela y esperar a que la volatilidad se estabilice antes de aumentar la exposiciÃ³n.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 40 menandakan transisi ke rezim Defensif. Momentum mendorong skor ke 40 seiring lonjakan VIX (Indeks Ketakutan) di atas 20 dan penguatan DXY (Kekuatan Dolar) yang menyedot likuiditas global. Meskipun ekuitas dan komoditas mengalami aksi jual tajam, NFCI (Stres Kredit) yang stabil menunjukkan ini adalah pembersihan likuiditas, bukan keruntuhan sistemik. Gangguan AI pada real estat kantor menjadi risiko tambahan yang perlu diwaspadai. Disarankan untuk bersikap defensif hingga volatilitas mereda dan indikator likuiditas membaik.

reports.DE: Der GMS-Score von 40 signalisiert den Ãœbergang in ein defensives Regime. Das Momentum drÃ¼ckte den Score auf 40, da der VIX (Angstindex) Ã¼ber 20 stieg und der DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke) die globale LiquiditÃ¤t einschrÃ¤nkte. WÃ¤hrend Aktien und Rohstoffe stark nachgeben, deutet der stabile NFCI (Kreditstress) eher auf einen LiquiditÃ¤tsengpass als auf einen Systemkollaps hin. Die KI-Disruption bei BÃ¼roimmobilien bleibt ein ernsthafter Belastungsfaktor. Vorsicht ist geboten; warten Sie auf eine Stabilisierung der VolatilitÃ¤t, bevor Sie neue Risiken eingehen.
reports.FR: Le score GMS de 40 indique une transition vers un rÃ©gime dÃ©fensif. L'Ã©lan a poussÃ© le score Ã  40 alors que le VIX (indice de peur) a dÃ©passÃ© 20 et que le DXY (force du dollar) a progressÃ©, drainant la liquiditÃ© mondiale. Bien que les actions et les matiÃ¨res premiÃ¨res chutent, la stabilitÃ© du NFCI (stress financier) suggÃ¨re une purge de liquiditÃ© plutÃ´t qu'un effondrement systÃ©mique. La perturbation de l'IA sur l'immobilier de bureau est un signal d'alarme important. Restez prudent et attendez une baisse de la volatilitÃ© avant de repositionner vos capitaux.
